com.communote.server.core.blog.export

Class PermalinkGenerationManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.blog.export.DefaultPermalinkGenerator
      • com.communote.server.core.blog.export.PermalinkGenerationManagement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PermalinkGenerator

    @Service
public class PermalinkGenerationManagement
extends DefaultPermalinkGenerator
    Service for generating permanent links. The service is a PermalinkGenerator itself.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

      • extractPermaLinkIdentifier

        public String extractPermaLinkIdentifier(String[] uriFragments)
        Delegates to the last added generator or the default generator. Get the type of perma link (one of the constants PermalinkGenerator.PERMA_ID_TOPICS etc).
        Specified by:
        extractPermaLinkIdentifier in interface PermalinkGenerator
        Overrides:
        extractPermaLinkIdentifier in class DefaultPermalinkGenerator
        Parameters:
        uriFragments - the splitted uri fragments
        Returns:
        the perma link identifier (that is 'blogs', 'users', 'tags' ...)

      • getBlogLink

        public String getBlogLink(String blogAlias,
                          boolean secure)
        Delegates to the last added generator or the default generator.
        Specified by:
        getBlogLink in interface PermalinkGenerator
        Overrides:
        getBlogLink in class DefaultPermalinkGenerator
        Parameters:
        blogAlias - the alias of the blog to get the link for
        secure - If true https will be used.
        Returns:
        the absolute perma link for the blog

      • getExternalObjectLink

        public String getExternalObjectLink(String externalSystemId,
                                    String externalObjectId)
        Returns a link to the given object within the external system.
        Parameters:
        externalSystemId - The external systems id.
        externalObjectId - The external objects id.
        Returns:
        The link or null, if there is no generator for the given System.
